import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import CommFoot from '../CommonComponents/CommFoot' import img from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Why Dreabee Section1.png' import img2 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Why Dreabee Section2.png' import card from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/card.png' import bar1 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Bars1.png' import bar2 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Bars2.png' import logo1 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Icons/iconamoon_search-light.png' import logo2 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Icons/solar_user-outline.png' import logo3 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Icons/solar_eye-scan-linear.png' import logo4 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Icons/radix-icons_speaker-loud.png' import img1 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Amazon.png' import img22 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Starbucks.png' import img3 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Spectrum.png' import img4 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Tesla.png' import img5 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Youtubee.png' import img6 from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/Delotte.png' import photo from '../../Imagez/CreatorsLandingPgImg/pink-line-section.png' import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer' const CreatorsLandingSec2 = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const signIn = () => { navigate("/SignUp") } const InflueReg = () => { navigate("/Phone_Verification_Influencers") } const [message, setMessage] = useState(false); const [message1, setMessage1] = useState(false); const [message2, setMessage2] = useState(false); const [message3, setMessage3] = useState(false); const [message4, setMessage4] = useState(false); const [message5, setMessage5] = useState(false); const textRef = useRef(null); // REFFF 1 const [ref1, inView1] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the animation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1000 }); // REFFF 2------WHYY DReabee const [ref2a, inView2a] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1500 }); // REFFF 2------WHYY DReabee const [ref2b, inView2b] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 2000 }); // REFFF 3 const [ref3, inView3] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the animation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1000 }); // REFFF 4 const [ref4, inView4] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 2000 }); const [ref4a, inView4a] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.9, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1000 }); const [ref4b, inView4b] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.9, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1000 }); // REFFF 5 const [ref5, inView5] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 2000 }); // REFFF 6 ----Up 6b const [ref6a, inView6a] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 2000 }); const [ref6b, inView6b] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1000 }); // REFFF 7 ----Up-side 7b const [ref7a, inView7a] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 2000 }); const [ref7b, inView7b] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, // Only trigger the anixmation once threshold: 0.4, // Trigger when at least 50% of the element is in view delay: 1000 }); return ( <>
{/* part 2 */}

Why DREABEE ?

Join the #1 destination where brands search Influencers for brand campaigns in India

Be a part of the community where 6700+ brands search for Influencers every month for campaigns/events.

{/* _______________link up_______________ */}

Create a free Profile in a hassle free manner

By creating your profile on Qoruz the chances of being visible to brands is 3x compared to any other platforms.

Be visible to6700+ Brands throughout the country

Be on top of the brand searches by creating your profile on Qoruz and work on different brand collaborations in your niche.

Get exclusive access to brand campaigns, events etc

Not just paid collaborations, build strong relationships with the brands and get exclusive access to the brand events and much more.

{/*
*/}
{/* bars */}
{/* back glow */}
{/* pink 1 bottom */}
{/* pink 2 top */}
{/* aqua 3 top */}
{/* part 3 */}

Get more than just Sponsored Partnerships.

Collaborate with more than 6700+ brands in the country, on different types of projects.

{/* card 1 */}

Create a free Profile in a hassle free manner

By creating your profile on Qoruz the chances of being visible to
brands is 3x compared to any other platforms.

{/* card 2 */}

Access to Exclusive events Music

fest, Brand launches, Invite only meetups and more.

{/* card 3 */}

Brand Rewards and Goodies

Get to try products and experiences ahead of everybody else.

{/* part 4 logos main section*/}

Over 6700 Brands are
searching for influencers

Top brands from all over the globe are searching
for influencers like you on Dreebee.

{/* back glow */}
{/* pink 1 bottom */}
{/* pink 2 top */}
{/* aqua 3 top */}
{/* aqua 4 bottom */}
{/* part 6 campaign */}

Some of the brand
campaigns you just missed

{/* card1 */}
Barter Campaign

#grandlingeriefestival

Style & Fashion | Lifestyle

{/* base line */}

Platform

Cash Reward

$3000Onwards
{/* card2 */}
Barter Campaign

#BingoMadholi

Food | Lifestyle

{/* base line */}

Platform

Cash Reward

$3000Onwards
{/* card3 */}
Barter Campaign

#BingoMadholi

Food

{/* base line */}

Platform

Cash Reward

$3000Onwards
{/* bars */}
{/* part 7 pink bg line */}
{/* text sec */}

Be on EVERY Top
Brand’s phonebook

{/* image */}
{/* part 5-fAQ */}

FAQs

{/* span1 */}
{ setMessage(!message) }} style={{ "border": "0px solid gray", "boxShadow": "0px 0px 10px 1px gray", "width": "50rem", "minHeight": "4.5rem", "backgroundColor": "", "borderRadius": "40px" }}>
